TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageTheme extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示頁面主題的基底類別，頁面主題是資源集合，用來定義網站上頁面和控制項的一致外觀。

span.span: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site.

summary.span: 頁面主題可以透過組態或頁面指示詞設定。

span.span: The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用頁面和控制項的開發人員， ，或直接類別。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. 這些類別可由 ASP.NET 剖析器和執行階段套用 ASP.NET 佈景主題和控制面板檔案與特定類型的控制項的頁面中所定義的樣式表項目。These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls. 網頁程式開發人員啟用 （或停用） 使用的網頁佈景主題和屬性。Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the and properties. 如需有關頁面主題的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Themes

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 物件之目錄相對 URL。

span.span: When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the object.

value.span: 字串值，包含 目錄的相對 URL。

span.span: A string value containing the relative URL of the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的屬性。The property is abstract. 佈景主題編譯時，會產生程式碼會覆寫屬性。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the property. 方法會使用屬性來解析相對 URL 的絕對 url。The method uses the property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 介面，其中包含目前頁面主題可用的所有預設面板名稱，並依控制項型別進行索引。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.

value.span: ，表示與目前頁面主題關聯的控制面板。

span.span: An that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的屬性。The property is abstract. 編譯時，佈景主題會產生這個屬性會覆寫的程式碼。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得連結至此頁面之樣式表陣列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.

value.span: 連結至此頁面之樣式表字串陣列。

span.span: A string array of style sheets linked to this page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是抽象的而且必須在衍生類別中實作。The property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. 編譯時，佈景主題會產生這個屬性會覆寫的程式碼。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.
